A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the movie has some flaws\, it is clearly more ambitious than any Star Wars to date and I think the risk pays off. It takes the characters\, the lore and the audience expectations and throws them around in an unexpected but ultimately fulfilling way. You can clearly see Rian Jhonson's ideas and creativity in it and the fact it's so ambitious makes it more vulnerable to initial criticism\, whereas TFA was endearing but ultimately safe. I think when the dust has settled\, this is going to be remembered as the third-best star wars movie after Empire and A New Hope.
